page.title: 04Interview Farmer Robertson
page.content: North of Edgefield lies a huge area of land called{West Edge Farm,}owned by farmer Robertson. {Lee}"What is the farm's name?" {Farmer}"Westedge Farm" {Lee}"How many acres do you own?" {Farmer}"240 in the area" {Lee}"What do you grow?" {Farmer}"Malting barley" {Lee}"How many people work here?" {Farmer}"3 people" {Lee}"Do you own any animals?" {Farmer}"No" {Lee}"What do you do in winter?" {Farmer}"We repair our vehicles" {Lee}"What vehicles do you use?" {Farmer}"We have 4 big tractors,a combine harvester,a seeder,two sets of harrows,two sets of rollers and a sprayer. Lee Witherspoon.
